pages.text: Infusing allows for the creation of quite powerful magical artifacts, but in this case, as often with staves, that alone is not enough. However, before creating a truly powerful artifact such as a magical staff, it is necessary to prepare a base for it. $(br)Using the altar, one can create an inert (for now) branch from dried wood, which will then form the foundation of a full-fledged staff.

pages.title: Infusion
pages.text: In rare cases like this one, the powers of the infusing process are not sufficient to create a complete artifact.
